<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Auspicious Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=256) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 115 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[divine ally (steed)](/Classes.aspx?ID=4); [Imposing Destrier](/Feats.aspx?ID=238)

</column>

---

Guided by your ongoing care, your steed has developed incredible intelligence and skill. The mount you gained through the divine ally class feature is now a [specialized animal companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=159). You can select one of the usual specializations or the auspice specialization.

 Auspice mounts gain the following benefits: Your companion is marked by your deity's religious symbol as a sacred creature of your deity. Its proficiency rank in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) increases to expert, it can speak the language associated with your deity's servitors ([Celestial](/Traits.aspx?ID=23) for champions who follow the tenets of good), and its Intelligence modifier increases by 2 and its Wisdom modifier by 1.
name: Auspicious Mount
